title: FT/FS t206 Rube Oldring miscut double-name
author: th38larg

posts.post_title: FT/FS t206 Rube Oldring miscut double-name
posts.post_content: Looking to send this impulse buy to a new home. I'd prefer an interesting trade (boxing, college football, some baseball sets) of pre-war or vintage material. However, I do appreciate cash payment of one form or another. Thanks for looking and don't be afraid to send me a message or post a reply.
